ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Bebop & Rocksteady Hit the Road
ComicInfo.Summary:
Bebop and Rocksteady’s trail of destruction has got them a lot of attention… including from the government who’s sending an army to stop them!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Nick Pitarra (a) & Michael Garland (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Kyle Strahm | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Buster Moody | 3 |
